mapper.select: select sa.id as sa_id,sav.id as sav_id,sa.*,sav.*,if(ssav.sku_id,1,0) as isChecked from pms_product_sale_attr as sa inner join pms_product_sale_attr_value as sav on sa.product_id =sav.product_id and sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id and sa.product_id = #{productId} left join pms_sku_sale_attr_value as ssav on sav.id = ssav.sale_attr_value_id and ssav.sku_id = #{skuId}
